Metadata.title: Terms of Use | Sprunki Infected
Metadata.description: Discover the rules of the kitchen before you start flipping burgers and solving puzzles in Sprunki Infected.

title: Terms of Use
subtitle: Your Recipe for a Fair and Fun Sprunki Infected Experience

acceptance.title: Accepting the Menu
acceptance.content: By diving into Sprunki Infected, you're agreeing to follow our house rules. Think of it as putting on your virtual chef's hat - you're committing to the full culinary experience!

userBehavior.title: Kitchen Etiquette
userBehavior.content: In our virtual restaurant, good behavior is as important as good food. Play fair, respect your fellow chefs, and keep the kitchen drama-free. Any foul play might result in you hanging up your apron for good.

disclaimer.title: The Heat of the Kitchen
disclaimer.content: Sprunki Infected can get as intense as a real kitchen during rush hour. We're not responsible if you feel the heat from tricky levels or competitive play. Remember, it's just a game - don't let it burn you out!

modification.title: Changing the Menu
modification.content: We might spice up these terms occasionally, just like we update our puzzle recipes. Continuing to play after changes means you're happy with the new flavor of our terms.

noAccount.title: No Reservation Needed
noAccount.content: Sprunki Infected is a walk-in restaurant - no account required! Jump right into the kitchen from your browser. Just remember, without an account, your culinary masterpieces and achievements might not be saved for next time.

intellectualProperty.title: Our Secret Sauce
intellectualProperty.content: Everything in Sprunki Infected - from the sizzling graphics to the mouth-watering game mechanics - is our special recipe. Please don't try to copy, share, or remix our secret ingredients without asking the head chef (that's us) first.
